Description: Invitation card, inscribed with name 'Mr Carpenter', to the private view of David Roberts' drawings from Egypt and Nubia, on 24 May of an unspecified year at 5 Haymarket, London, premises of the printseller and publisher Joseph Hogarth; image of Egyptian winged sundisk with two cobras at top, cartouche below flanked by two Egyptian figures, kneeling, facing one another, holding tall stylised flowers. Chromolithograph
